reviewText: I was really looking forward to this, but I could never get the DVD to read. I tried several PC's, my Mac and a standard DVD player. I had a computer tech I work with try to load it and the disc could not be recognized by any of his tools. The crappy thing is I purchased several Gnomon DVDs at the same time and have been working thru them in sequence, so even though I just opened it, it is well past the return period. FYI the seller was Warehouse Deals, Inc. I have enjoyed most of the Gnomon Dvds very much, but my money was flushed down the hopper with this one.
